articles.title: Ferdinand slams 'invisible' Manchester United duo following shock Sheffield United defeat - Goal.com
articles.description: Liverpool left-back Kostas Tsimikas says he is eagerly awaiting his Premier League debut for the club, having been held back by injuries since his arrival from Olympiakos.

articles.title: Man Utd rocked in huge upset, Chelsea star ‘seething’ as new boss’ shake-up fails - Fox Sports
articles.description: Thomas Tuchel rang in the changes for his first match as Chelsea boss but failed to make an immediate impact after replacing Frank Lampard at Stamford Bridge.
